Class Mandelbrot

java.lang.Object
  Mandelbrot

public class Mandelbrot
extends java.lang.Object

A Utility class that provides static methods for generating Mandelbrot sets.

Author:
Samuel Rodríguez Martínez

Method Detail

diverges

public static boolean diverges(ComplexNumber C)
Checks if the given ComplexNumber diverges.

Parameters:
C - - The ComplexNumber to be evaluated.
Returns:
boolean - true if the ComplexNumber C diverges, false otherwise.

divergenceIndex

public static int divergenceIndex(ComplexNumber C)
Returns the index of divergence of the given ComplexNumber C.

Parameters:
C - - The ComplexNumber to be evaluated.
Returns:
int - The divergence index i (0 <= i <= 256), returns -1 if C converges.

getColor

public static java.awt.Color getColor(int colorIndex)
Returns an appropriate color from a given divergence index.

Parameters:
colorIndex - - The divergence index of the ComplexNumber from the pixel to be colored.
Returns:
A Color object with the appropriate color for coloring the pixel.
